unnormalised: Arey yaar, my cart abandonment rate is higher than IIT-JEE cutoffs! Did my kaleji-colored kurta scare them away at 23:59 hrs on 26/01/2023? Maybe the shipping to Chennai at Rs. 500 extra was too much? Come back, Sharma ji! It's just a cart, not your shaadi on 14/02/2024! Don't leave me hanging like a Diwali light!
normalised: Oh friend, my cart abandonment rate is higher than I I T-J E E cutoffs! Did my kaleji-colored kurta scare them away at twenty three fifty nine hours on twenty sixth january two thousand and twenty three? Maybe the shipping to Chennai at rupee five hundred extra was too much? Come back, Sharma ji! It's just a cart, not your shaadi on fourteenth february two thousand and twenty four! Don't leave me hanging like a Diwali light!
